text:
CURRICULUM VITAE
Vishalkumar Rasiklal Panchal
Maintenance (Electrical) Engineer
Emai:  vishalpanchal99@gmail.com , Phone:  (+91) 9979301564
Career Objective :
To utilize my skill-set towards a challenging job in a leading edge organization that
will reorganize and values individuals as well as the team contribution.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---
Professional Profile:
A competent professional with 6 years and 8 months of experience in electrical
power  utility/electrical  network  management  (HT  &  LT)  /  HV  &  LV  project
management  /  Electrical  power  distribution  /  electrical  network  analyzing,
Engineering,  Operation,  Maintenance,  Project  Commissioning  and  Plant
modifications in Electrical & control field of Power distribution  and Transmission.
Organization       :   Utility & Power.
Duration :   July 2010 to Till Date.
Current Position         :   Assistant Manager.
Location                        :   Naroda Sub Zonal Office, Naroda, Ahmedabad, India.
Key tasks       :
Responsible  for  all  maintenance  related  activities  including  materials
management,  man  power  management,  job  distribution,  job  supervision,
execution and supervision of contractual jobs, responding and attending  minor /
major plant abnormalities.
Engaging in the Identification and rectification of LT cable faults, M&R jobs of LT
underground network. Overseeing LT network development w.r.t load growth. 
Meticulously handling Cable Laying and Cable Jointing activities; responsible for
the Installation of service apparatus 
Performing the installation of power distribution boxes (DB-Distribution Box, SFU-
Switch Fuse Unit, MSP-Mini Section Pillar and FSP-Fuse Section Pillar)
Demonstrating proficiency in Meter reader complaints, Procedure for new service
connection, load regularization. 
Minimizing the performance bottlenecks for high productivity with maximization
of men, material & machine. 
Coordinating equipment installation and maintenance activities with operations to
avoid disruptions in communications and ensure efficiency of operations.
Reviewing existing systems & procedures and design internal controls/ quality
checks for various operational areas for achieving higher operational efficiency,
resource rationalization and maintenance cost.
Ensuring adherence to Safety standards in all functional areas and implementing
measures for enhancing safety levels. 
Attending network tripping in ring mains system. Identify faulty area & restore
the power after required switching.
Involved  in  Power  supply  arrangement  &  management  for  functions  such  as
vibrant  Navaratri  mahotsav,  Kite  festival,  VIP  sitting  arrangement,  Ganesh
Chaturthi.
Achieving G.E.R.C standards for complaint attending time & complaint restoration
time.
Shouldering  the  onus  of  Creating  &  maintaining  data  for  different  types  of
corporate & zonal reports. 
Leading the efforts in Capex (capital expenditure), Opex (operational expenditure)
& operational parameters budget for next 5 years & detailed budget for next year.
Detecting theft and taking corrective actions to prevent the same in the future.
Checking  services  in  lots  &  identifying  services  for  diversion  of  energy  &
unauthorized use of energy. 
Effectively using of updated network information for taking corrective action on
site (2) sales gap analysis. 
Major Achievements
Deputed  as  Lead  member  in  No  power  complaints  &  cable  fault  reduction
committee & achieved 25% reduction in 1st year. 
Trained more than 200 persons for SAP software in Plant Maintenance & Project
System module.
Internal auditor for Integrated Management System(ISO_Standards)
Core Team Member for implementation of IMS Certifications.
Team leader for execution of Low voltage Special Project.
Group leader in developing New Mobile application of Low voltage distribution 
system.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---
Functional Competencies 
HT & LT Distribution network.
Experience  in  working  with  and  giving  training  on  SAP  and  power  user  in
PM ,CRM & PS module. 
Installation, Maintenance &Repair of low voltage distribution Network..
Analysis of Saifi-Saidi reduction.
Monitor the progress & quality of survey, execution & meter connection activities
to ensure timely completion of the same.
Review  &  Monitor  asset  survey  findings  and  plan  for  asset  maintenance  /
replacement.
Internal auditor of ISO standards.
QMS_ISO_9001:2015,EMS_ISO_14001:2015,OHSAS_ISO_18001:2007,EnMS_ISO_
50001:2011,AMS_ISO_55001:2014)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---
Educational Qualifications:
Bachelor of Engineering – Electrical Engineering from L.D. College of 
engineering, Ahmedabad, Gujarat University, India with 63.8% marks in June-
2010.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---

                                                           Ahmadabad, Gujarat, India-382418
Permanent Address :   C-102, Radhekishan Residency, Vastral,         
                                                           Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India-382418
Languages :   English, Gujarati, Hindi,.
Gender/ Marital Status :   Male / Married
DOB / Nationality :   21-June-1989, Indian
Passport :   M2546216 issued at Ahmedabad, India.
Current CTC :   33,737 SAR (6,00,000 INR or 9000 $)Required CTC :   Negotiable

Yours Truly, 
 Vishal Panchal
